wikitext.*:
'''Oxonmoot''' is an annual convention organised by [[The Tolkien Society]]. It is usually held at a college of the [[University of Oxford]] in [[Oxford]], England, and was formerly conducted on the weekend closest to [[22 September]], the shared birthday of [[Bilbo Baggins|Bilbo]] and [[Frodo Baggins]]. In recent years, however, it has instead been organised over the first weekend of September.<ref name="OM1">{{webcite|articleurl=http://www.tolkiensociety.org/oxon/|articlename=Oxonmoot index page|website=[http://www.tolkiensociety.org/ The Tolkien Society]|accessed=07-August-2012}}</ref>

The moot usually includes talks, a quiz, an art show, a masquerade and other entertainments, a visit to [[Wolvercote Cemetery|Tolkien's grave]] in north Oxford, and last, but not least, the chance to spend a weekend in the company of other fans of Tolkien's work. Most of the event is held in an Oxford college.
